titleStmt.title: Pseudo Johannensium Polymastix qui Apollini Sminthei et Jovi Apomuiō sacros, profanos, devotos, dicatos, hommunciones, agasones, nebulones, explicat lacessit, lacerat. St. Johns in sippets drest, no flesh nor fish, the giblets of a malt horse packt it dish, stuffe that would choake a mallats crany throat, Manchesters impe in a blew scarlet coat; adopted pettitoes to th' houses stumps cloven into Presbyterian lumps and independent; may they serve to be their masters porters to the gallow tree: may these blinde beare whelpes lasht be to resent, beare whelps neer lickt t' a form of government: the whore of Babylon who'l feare when these bastards are whipt to their owne parishes.

Pseudo Johannensium Polymastix qui Apollini Sminthei et Jovi Apomuiō sacros, profanos, devotos, dicatos, hommunciones, agasones, nebulones, explicat lacessit, lacerat. St. Johns in sippets drest, no flesh nor fish, the giblets of a malt horse packt it dish, stuffe that would choake a mallats crany throat, Manchesters impe in a blew scarlet coat; adopted pettitoes to th' houses stumps cloven into Presbyterian lumps and independent; may they serve to be their masters porters to the gallow tree: may these blinde beare whelpes lasht be to resent, beare whelps neer lickt t' a form of government: the whore of Babylon who'l feare when these bastards are whipt to their owne parishes.

notesStmt.note: The words "Sminthei" and "Apomuiō" are in Greek characters on title page.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
